dcterms:creator: J. T. Barron
B. Mildenhall
D. Verbin
P. P. Srinivasan
P. Hedman
dcterms:description: The Mip-NeRF 360 dataset is used for extensive experiments to evaluate the performance of the proposed method in both bounded and unbounded scenes, demonstrating superior or comparable performance compared to state-of-the-art Gaussian anti-aliasing methods.
dcterms:title: Mip-NeRF 360

dcterms:creator: B. Mildenhall
P. P. Srinivasan
M. Tancik
J. T. Barron
R. Ramamoorthi
R. Ng
dcterms:description: The Blender dataset is utilized for multi-scale training and testing, allowing the evaluation of the proposed method's performance across various resolutions, demonstrating stable performance without modifying the training procedure.
dcterms:title: Blender
